Notes

Check the included text file for a list of what's been patched
Included DLCs
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (L) Three Color Leningrad Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (M) Three Color Leningrad Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (H) Three Color Leningrad Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (L) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (M) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (H) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (L) Three Color Northwestern Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (H) Three Color Northwestern Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (M) Three Color Northwestern Front
COH 2 - German Skin: (L) Late War Factory Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (M) Late War Factory Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (H) Late War Factory Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (L) Three Color Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (M) Three Color Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (H) Three Color Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (L) Winter Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (M) Winter Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (H) Winter Ambush Pattern
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (H) Winter Cobblestone West Front
COH 2 - Soviet Skin: (H) Two Tone Bryansk Front
COH 2 - German Skin: (H) Field Applied Whitewash Pattern
COH 2 - German Skin: (H) Three Color Disruptive Pattern
COH 2 - Soviet Commander: Conscripts Support Tactics
COH 2 - Soviet Commander: Anti-Infantry Tactics
COH 2 - German Commander: Joint Operations Doctrine
COH 2 - German Commander: Spearhead Doctrine

In the world's darkest hour you are a commander of the Soviet Red Army,
entrenched in brutal frontline warfare to free Mother Russia from the Nazi
invaders

It is 1941 and the beginning of what will become the bloodiest conflict of
World War II resulting in more than 14 million military casualties

Witness the struggles of the Red Army from near defeat through their
incredible triumph over Germany in the most challenging and costly theatre
of the war, the Eastern Front

Your military tactics hold the power to tip the very balance of this
conflict. Engage in tactical combat that will define you as a military
leader and wield the might of the Soviet Empire as you smash your way to
Berlin

The Motherland is Calling

1. Unrar
2. Install the update
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your game
install directory
4. Play the game
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
